body:
If you could have the chance to merge any maps together, what would it be. It can be from any minigame and it can be as many as you want.

Example: Sandstorm Complex (Sandstorm, Alpha Complex: Nebula)
body_tagged:
If you could have the chance to merge any maps together, what would it be. It can be from any minigame and it can be as many as you want.

Example: Sandstorm Complex (Sandstorm, Alpha Complex: Nebula)
title: Merge together any maps of your choice

replies.body: Frostbite + Proelium + Clay Wars = longest match duration.
replies.body_tagged: Frostbite + Proelium + Clay Wars = longest match duration.

replies.body: Frostbite Map and Objective + Venomous TDM armor and weapons = long
replies.body_tagged: Frostbite Map and Objective + Venomous TDM armor and weapons = long
